In Exchange Online Protection (EOP) and Microsoft Defender for Office 365, quarantine policies allow admins to DEFINE the user experience for quarantined messages:

What users are allowed to do to their own quarantined messages (messages where they're a recipient) based on why the message was quarantined.

Whether users receive periodic (every four hours, daily, or weekly) notifications about their quarantined messages via quarantine notifications.
